portfolio.title: Fabre TikTik

portfolio.description: My TikTok Clone Application includes Google Auth, the ability to upload, publish, share, comment on, and like the videos; filtering by categories and advanced search functionalities, profile pages, suggested accounts, custom responsive design, and much more.
